description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国企业家、政治人物。
位于东亚的社会主义国家，通称中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于上海的一家西服公司。
description.en: A suit company based in Shanghai.

nodes.id: 第十一届全国政协委员

zh-cn: 第十一届全国政协委员

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会的委员群体。
description.en: The group of members of the 11th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 金建华是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Jin Jianhua is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 金建华担任上海新世界有限公司董事。
description.en: Jin Jianhua serves as a director of Shanghai New World Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 金建华担任上海培罗蒙西服公司党委书记。
description.en: Jin Jianhua serves as the Party Committee Secretary of Shanghai Pelermon Suit Company.

relationships.target: 第十一届全国政协委员

description.zh-cn: 2008年，金建华当选第十一届全国政协委员，代表经济界，分入第三十五组。
description.en: In 2008, Jin Jianhua was elected as a member of the 11th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, representing the economic sector in group 35.
